summary: This module contains unit tests for the Open Library URL processing utilities. It defines a lightweight inâ€‘memory mock site to simulate web requests and provides helper functions used by the tests. The test cases verify that readable URLs are generated correctly, that objects can be retrieved from the mock site, and that URL listings behave as expected.
business_intent: Validate the correctness of URL processing and object retrieval logic in the Open Library backend, ensuring that readable URL generation and related processor functions work reliably before deployment.
